page.title: 13Glenagoorland school meals
page.content: Out of the {35 children} at school{31 of these take school dinners.{12 {children}get free school meals and the rest pay {60p each day.}The dinners are cooked in the kitchen by the cook. An assistant comes in to help the cook serve the meals and clear up afterwards. Before we start eating we sing a grace"Thank you for the world so sweet". Some days we get roast meat, potatoes, gravy and cabbage for dinner and custard and cake for pudding. Everyone has to eat a bit of their dinner.Afterwards we go outside and play football.
